field.label: Basic Profile Data
field.tooltip: Data fields include: Social ID, Social ID Provider, First Name, Middle Name, Last Name, Full Name, Nick Name, Profile Name, Birthdate, Gender, Country Code, Country Name, Thumbnail Image Url, Image Url, Local Country, Profile Country

field.label: Extended Location Data
field.tooltip: Data fields include: Main Address, Hometown, State, City, Local City, Profile City, Profile Url, Local Language, Language

field.label: Extended Profile Data
field.tooltip: Data fields include: Website, Favicon, Industry, About, Timezone, Verified, Last Profile Update, Created, Relationship Status, Favorite Quote, Interested In, Interests, Religion, Political View, HTTPS Image Url, Followers Count, Friends Count, Is Geo Enabled, Total Status Count, Number of Recommenders, Honors, Associations, Hirable, Repository Url, Age, Professional Headline, Provider Access Token, Provider Token Secret, Positions, Companies, Education, Phone Numbers, IM Accounts, Addresses, Sports, Inspirational People, Skills, Current Status, Certifications, Courses, Volunteer, Recommendations Received, Languages, Patents, Favorites, Books

field.label: Companies
field.tooltip: A list of all the companies this user follows on LinkedIn.

field.label: Facebook Profile Events
field.tooltip: A list of events (birthdays, invitation, etc.) on the Facebook profile of user

field.label: Status Messages
field.tooltip: Facebook wall activity, Twitter tweets and LinkedIn status of the user, including links

field.label: Facebook Posts
field.tooltip: Facebook posts of the user, including links

field.label: Twitter Mentions
field.tooltip: A list of tweets that the user is mentioned in.

field.label: Groups
field.tooltip: A list of the groups of user.

field.label: Contacts/Friend Data
field.tooltip: For email providers (Google and Yahoo), a list of the contacts of user in his/her address book. For social networks (Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn), a list of the people in the network of user.

field.label: Facebook Likes Data
field.tooltip: A list of Facebook likes of user (Recent 500 likes)
